sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì chún tiānrán de fēngmì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est du miel 100% naturel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is pure natural honey.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huāpén fàng zài chuāngtái shàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le pot de fleurs est posé sur le rebord de la fenêtre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The flower pot is on the windowsill.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们可以通过网络获取信息。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen kěyǐ tōngguò wǎngluò huòqǔ xìnxī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous pouvons obtenir des informations via Internet.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We can get information through the internet.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 公司目前处于发展阶段。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī mùqián chǔyú fāzhǎn jiēduàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise est actuellement en phase de développement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company is currently in a development stage.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè píng shuǐ yǒu wǔbǎi háoshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette bouteille d'eau fait 500 millilitres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This bottle of water is 500 milliliters.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fēijī jíjiāng qǐfēi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'avion est sur le point de décoller.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The plane is about to take off.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我昨晚做了一个奇怪的梦。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zuówǎn zuò le yī gè qíguài de mèng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai fait un rêve étrange hier soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I had a strange dream last night.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我需要一把刷子来刷墙。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào yī bǎ shuāzi lái shuā qiáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin d'une brosse pour peindre le mur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need a brush to paint the wall.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shí jiǎn sān děngyú qī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Dix moins trois égale sept.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Ten minus three equals seven.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bùyào shuō zìjǐ bèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne dis pas que tu es bête.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't say you're stupid.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè kuǎn shǒujī yǐjīng jiàngjià le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce téléphone est déjà en promotion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This phone has already been discounted.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè nándé de jīyù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une occasion rare.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a rare opportunity.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā bùdàn cōngming, érqiě qínfèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est non seulement intelligent, mais aussi travailleur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is not only smart, but also hardworking.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 春天来了，花儿开始开花了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chūntiān lái le, huār kāishǐ kāihuā le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le printemps est arrivé, les fleurs commencent à fleurir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Spring has come, the flowers are starting to bloom.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们周末一起聚一聚吧。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen zhōumò yīqǐ jù yī jù ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Retrouvons-nous ce week-end.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's get together this weekend.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng àn shùnxù páiduì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez faire la queue dans l'ordre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please line up in order.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó yǒu wǔshíliù gè mínzú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Chine compte cinquante-six ethnies.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China has fifty-six ethnic groups.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我的自行车需要修一修。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de zìxíngchē xūyào xiū yī xiū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon vélo a besoin d'être réparé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My bicycle needs to be repaired.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de shǒuzhǐ liúxuè le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son doigt saigne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His finger is bleeding.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个价格是原来的两倍。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège jiàgé shì yuánlái de liǎng bèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce prix est le double du prix d'origine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This price is twice the original.
